summary:
Dwemer themed retexture of Nightingale prime mod by satyr Zerofrost.
*MALE ONLY ATM*
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hybrid\'s - Dwemer-Nightingale Theme
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Version: v1.0
Date: 01/16/2012
Category: Textures
Author: Gabriel Gullbergh, Hybrid Media



Description
===========
*MALE ONLY ATM*
Dwemer themed retexture of Nightingale prime mod by satyr Zerofrost.

The original mod was apparently taken off the nexus for some odd reason.

If anyone would be willing to make the female version I would be glad to send you my layered .PSD files.

Install
=======
1. Download.
2. Extract. Copy/Move Data folder to your Skyrim directory. 
3. Overwrite existing file if neccesary.
4. Launch Skyrim!


Contact
=======
Please PM me via my username at this site.


Tools Used
==========
Photoshop CS5- http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/


Licensing/Legal
===============
Feel free to do whatever you like with this mod, but please give credit.
author: Mystikhybrid - Gabriel Gullbergh
